Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occured.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition in a human-readable form.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

GetMarketplaceParticipationsResponse.description: The response schema for the getMarketplaceParticipations operation.

Marketplace.description: Detailed information about an Amazon market where a seller can list items for sale and customers can view and purchase items.

countryCode.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format country code of the marketplace.

defaultCurrencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 format currency code of the marketplace.

defaultLanguageCode.description: The ISO 639-1 format language code of the marketplace.

domainName.description: The domain name of the marketplace.

Participation.description: Detailed information that is specific to a seller in a Marketplace.

hasSuspendedListings.description: Specifies if the seller has suspended listings. True if the seller Listing Status is set to Inactive, otherwise False.

info.description: The Selling Partner API for Sellers lets you retrieve information on behalf of sellers about their seller account, such as the marketplaces they participate in. Along with listing the marketplaces that a seller can sell in, the API also provides additional information about the marketplace such as the default language and the default currency. The API also provides seller-specific information such as whether the seller has suspended listings in that marketplace.
info.title: Selling Partner API for Sellers

get.description:
Returns a list of marketplaces that the seller submitting the request can sell in and information about the seller's participation in those marketplaces.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| .016 | 15 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

400.description: Request has missing or invalid parameters and cannot be parsed.

403.description: 403 can be caused for reasons like Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, Invalid Signature or Resource Not Found.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

413.description: The request size exceeded the maximum accepted size.

415.description: The entity of the request is in a format not supported by the requested resource.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

500.description: Encountered an unexpected condition which prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
